objects.text:
• Premium canvas upper construction
• Iconic star logo design
• Cushioned insole for comfort
• Classic retro style

product_details.name: Comet Classic Canvas Sneakers - Urban Comfort Meets Retro Style
product_details.description:
• Premium canvas upper construction for durability and breathability
• Iconic star logo design on sides for distinctive branding
• Brown gum rubber outsole providing excellent grip and traction
• Cream/off-white colorway perfect for versatile styling
• Cushioned insole for all-day comfort
• Brown leather accents and laces adding premium detailing
• Low-top silhouette ideal for casual everyday wear
• Reinforced stitching for enhanced durability
• Classic court-inspired design with modern comfort features
• Lightweight construction for easy movement

banner_details:
This banner features a modern, minimalist promotional layout for a sneaker product with a retro appeal. It is divided into four quadrants with a soft grid overlay, maintaining a clean visual structure. The top-left quadrant contains bold, uppercase text layers (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) forming the product name, followed by a smaller tagline (`tagline`) emphasizing style and comfort. The top-right quadrant highlights a shoe image (`product_image`) placed prominently for focus. The bottom half splits into feature highlights on the left (`description`) and bold pricing information (`price`) with a clear call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`) on the right.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream: `#F5F2EA`
- Soft Beige: `#E8E2D4`
- Warm Taupe: `#D8CFBD`
- Brownstone: `#BEA88D`
- Cocoa Brown: `#A48C6E`
- Mocha: `#5D4A3C`
- Warm Grey: `#78624E`
product_color: The product image features a sneaker dominated by earthy, neutral tones, creating a versatile and timeless look. The primary color is a soft cream/beige (#F5F0E6), which covers most of the upper canvas, providing a clean and warm base. Brown accents (#6B4C3B) on the laces and outsole add contrast and depth, while the sole midsection in a light taupe/beige (#E1D6C6) blends smoothly with the upper. The white star emblem (#FFFFFF), outlined in brown, draws attention and adds visual interest. The subtle blending of neutral hues with strategic contrast highlights each element. Ideal banner palette includes: #F5F0E6, #6B4C3B, #FFFFFF, #E1D6C6, #B27E5E.
